articles.author: Sarah Whitten
articles.title: Taylor Swift's tour promoter says it had no choice but to work with Ticketmaster - CNBC
articles.description: AEG Presents, the company in charge of handling Taylor Swift's upcoming tour, said it didn't have any choice but to work with Ticketmaster.
articles.content: Taylor Swift's tour promoter is shifting blame for the botched "Eras" ticket sale squarely onto Ticketmaster, potentially fueling even more concerns about the Live Nation-owned ticket seller's domina… [+739 chars]
